text: Tam jekara iha loka tuhade kahe anusara na kara sakana tam samajha lavo ki uha sirafa apani icha da palana kara rahe hana. Ate unham tom zi'ada raha tom bhataki'a kauna hovega jihara alaha ve maraga darasana tom ilava apani icha da palana kara rahe hana. Besaka alaha zalima lokam nu raha nahim dikha'unda
